com.baasbox.android

Class BaasObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.baasbox.android.BaasObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaasDocument, BaasFile

    public abstract class BaasObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for remote resources that can be saved and retrieved from BaasBox.
    Since:
    0.7.3

    • Method Summary

      • isNew

        public final boolean isNew()
        Returns true if this object has no conunterpart on the BaasBox server.
        Returns:
        true if this object has no conunterpart on the BaasBox server

      • getId

        public abstract java.lang.String getId()
        The id of this object on the server. New objects created locally have no id.
        Returns:
        a uuid as a String or null.

      • getVersion

        public abstract long getVersion()
        The version number of this object.
        Returns:
        a long version number

      • getAuthor

        public abstract java.lang.String getAuthor()
        The username of the owner of this object, or null if this object is new.
        Returns:
        a username as String or null

      • getCreationDate

        public abstract java.lang.String getCreationDate()
        The date this object was created on the server, or null if the object is new.
        Returns:
        a string representation of a date.

      • revokeSync

        public abstract BaasResult<java.lang.Void> revokeSync(Grant grant,
                                    java.lang.String username)
        Synchronously revokes the access grant to this object from username.
        Parameters:
        grant - a non null Grant
        username - a non null username
        Returns:
        the outcome of the request wrapped in a BaasResult

      • grant

        public abstract RequestToken grant(Grant grant,
                 java.lang.String username,
                 Priority priority,
                 BaasHandler<java.lang.Void> handler)
        Asynchronously grants the access grant to this object to username. The outcome of the request is handed to the provided handler. The request is executed with the specified Priority.
        Parameters:
        grant - a non null Grant
        username - a non null username
        priority - a priority at which execute the request
        handler - an handler that will receive the outcome of the request.
        Returns:
        a RequestToken to manage the asynchronous request

      • grant

        public final RequestToken grant(Grant grant,
                 java.lang.String username,
                 BaasHandler<java.lang.Void> handler)
        Asynchronously grants the access grant to this object to username. The outcome of the request is handed to the provided handler. The request is executed with default Priority.
        Parameters:
        grant - a non null Grant
        username - a non null username
        handler - an handler that will receive the outcome of the request.
        Returns:
        a RequestToken to manage the asynchronous request

      • grantAll

        public abstract RequestToken grantAll(Grant grant,
                    java.lang.String role,
                    Priority priority,
                    BaasHandler<java.lang.Void> handler)
        Asynchronously grants the access grant to this object to users with role. The outcome of the request is handed to the provided handler. The request is executed with the specified Priority.
        Parameters:
        grant - a non null Grant
        role - a non null username
        priority - a priority at which execute the request
        handler - an handler that will receive the outcome of the request.
        Returns:
        a RequestToken to manage the asynchronous request
